lines.text: What are you going to do, find Warren and bring him in? You can't tie him to this or any of the others. You don't even have a pattern anymore!
Time of death, when the girls got home. They were students just back from campus.
A woman named Hubbard who had children.
The Nursery Rhymes, all the woman he killed... You said you needed a pattern. 'The butcher, the baker, the candlestick maker".
Your friend Jean, she had a whole sale meat business.
And one of them had a bakery.
The motives thereto - it's YOU, Joanna. It's you he's killing, again and again.
